resources.string: Why does the app require notification access?
In order to play a scav sound when a notification is received, it is necessary to monitor the incoming notifications.\nThe notification\'s content is not used in any other way besides that.
How can I share a scav audio line?
Perform a long press on a audio clip in the "Junk Box" page.
No, this is a fan app.
Yes, get the code at REPLACE WITH REPO LINK
I still hear the original notification sound in addition to the scav sound, what should I do?

To mute the original app's notification sound:
 1) click on the app item In the main page
 2) click on the desired notification channel
 3) click on "Sound" and pick "Silent"
What is the font used in the titles?
It is a Tarkov inspired font by IWolf.
What will happen if I use this app while playing escape from tarkov?
It is recommended to switch the phone to silent mode when playing escape from tarkov to avoid moments of extreme stress.
